long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yoko Networks CRM Integration integration providing database driven screen pops. The Yoko Networks CRM Integration app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce.com, Zendesk, etc.) By leveraging APIs the Yoko Networks CRM Integration extension will search any internal database and present findings in a new window.  The Yoko Networks CRM Integration app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
